# File test/ts_gdata.rb, line 33
  def test_jlength
    s = "Καλημέρα κόσμε!"
    assert_equal(15, s.jlength) # Note the 'j'
    assert_not_equal(15, s.length) # Normal, non unicode length
    assert_equal(28, s.length) # Greek letters happen to take two-bytes
  end
